com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest

Class RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack
  • Enclosing class:
    RestClient

    public static class RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack
extends java.lang.Object
    HttpStack for talking to Salesforce (sets oauth header and does oauth refresh when needed)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack(java.lang.String authToken, HttpAccess httpAccessor, RestClient.AuthTokenProvider authTokenProvider)
      Constructs a SalesforceHttpStack with the given clientInfo, authToken, httpAccessor and authTokenProvider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack

        public RestClient.SalesforceHttpStack(java.lang.String authToken,
                              HttpAccess httpAccessor,
                              RestClient.AuthTokenProvider authTokenProvider)
        Constructs a SalesforceHttpStack with the given clientInfo, authToken, httpAccessor and authTokenProvider. When it gets a 401 (not authorized) response from the server:
        • If authTokenProvider is not null, it will ask the authTokenProvider for a new access token and retry the request a second time.
        • Otherwise it will return the 401 response.
        Parameters:
        authToken -
        httpAccessor -
        authTokenProvider -

      • uploadFile

        public RestResponse uploadFile(java.io.File theFile,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      RestClient client,
                      java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String description)
        Uploads a new file to the server. This will create a new file at version 1.
        Parameters:
        theFile - The path of the local file to upload to the server.
        name - The name/title of this file.
        client - RestClient instance.
        title - Title.
        description - Description.
        Returns:
        The response received from the server.
